name: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic
name_original: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic
description:
The aggressiveness of the clown is unpredictable. This creates a unique interaction with it in comparison with other Survival Horror genre games:

The state of the Giggler.
In it, the Clown does not run fast, it is easy to hear, attacks with paired knives and does little damage. The duration of the attack is short.

Condition Smoker
In this state, the clown is more aggressive, attacks with paired knives, and will try to kill the player whenever possible. Emits poisonous fumes.

The main goal of the game:
You are a young teacher who really needs money, you agreed to come to school late at night for an interview. Your goal is to open the main exit and escape from the building. To do this, you need to find a key card to get out of school.

In early access, the game provides three modes, each with its own visual designs and gameplay features.

1. Dream and insomnia are fairly simple levels for beginners. The player's abilities are enough to survive. The card key is very easy to find.
2. Nightmare and Trauma is a complex gameplay, the key of the card is harder to find. There are traps on the levels.
3. Hell mode. The most difficult of the modes, especially for those who want to test themselves. (Very difficult mode)

Its show time!!!
